title: Pixie Lott slips into a polka dot for morning yoga
title_page: Pixie Lott slips into a polka dot for morning yoga | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's spent many a summer in sunny LA - but Pixie Lott was California dreaming on Wednesday as she shared a flashback to the poolside.
The stunning popstar contorted her lean figure into an impressive back bend as she shared her morning yoga routine.
Dressed in just a teeny polka dot bikini, Pixie was the picture of perfection with her torso turned to the sun and her legs outstretched with pointed toes.
Scroll down for video
Body beautiful: Pixie Lott showed off her impressive flexibility on Wednesday, as she shared a flashback of her morning yoga routine
'Morning yoga. Rise and shine,' she wrote beside the sunkissed picture from her time in Los Angeles.
Flexy Pixie was lying by the side of the pool, tucking her head underneath her body to stretch out her spine.
She had a hoodie tied around her waist but otherwise left her bikini body on show by choosing to do her morning ritual in her two-piece.
Pink to make the boys wink: Tagging California, Pixie hinted that the image was a flashback thanks to her newly-pink hued hair
The workout picture pre-dates Pixie's new candy-floss coloured hair do, which she unveiled two weeks ago.
As a popstar and former Strictly Come Dancing contestant, Pixie is known for her gymnastic and dancing prowess.
In 2014, the singer took part in the 12th series of the BBC One celebrity competition Strictly.
Keeping fit: Pixie stays in shape with a combination of dance, ballet and yoga
She was the youngest contestant of that cycle at 23, but sadly crashed out in the 11th week as part of a series that saw Caroline Flack take the glitterball trophy.
After her dancing stint, Pixie confessed that she definitely not a gym bunny, saying she finds it 'so boring'.
'I don't hit the gym at all; I find it so boring. But I love, love dancing,' she told Hello magazine.
'Dancing is a great all-over body workout, but you really enjoy it so it doesn't feel like exercise.'
More of a ballet and yoga fan, Pixie has even been known to share meditation classes with fiance Oliver Cheshire.
Two's company: Pixie has been known to practise yoga with model boyfriend Oliver Cheshire (left)
Body beautiful: A self-confessed dance lover, Pixie says she hates the gym because it's boring
